name: Jumpr (Beez)
description:
Jumpr (Press R!)

Jumpr is a game prototype made with the Bevy Engine, for the third Bevy Jam. The theme was "side effects," and it was implemented "concretely" via the behavior of the side walls in the game.

Summary

Jumpr is a little game where you kick the dropping balls to prevent them from dropping.

Every several seconds, an additional ball is added to the scene for more challenge, and you fail if you drop three balls.

Dropped balls are not removed from the scene. They come back from the top for even more challenges!

Controls

Here is the list of essential controls.

Start/Restart Game: R

Kick: Left Mouse Button

Exit: Escape

Credits

Ata Deniz Oktay - Game Design & Programming

Source Code

You can reach the source code of Jumpr from the Github repository of the project.
